name: Bunnious
description:
Bunnious!

"Where bunnies explore their world to gain diamonds and rare carrots"

Bunnious is a simple platform game that its goal its to help the bunnies getting all the pink and beige diamonds, also getting the precious carrot that usually accour on the highest surface.

Bunnious public repositories: https://gitlab.com/Nisrinous/game-development-1weekgamejam
